faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: The most important questions and answers about the service.

faqs.question: How long does implementation take?
faqs.answer: We typically set up the system in 1-2 business days. If importing existing data, the full migration takes 3-5 days. We assist you throughout the implementation.

faqs.question: What happens after the trial period?
faqs.answer: At the end of the 30-day trial, we analyze usage and create a personalized quote. No automatic billing – you only pay if you're satisfied and want to continue.

faqs.question: Is there a commitment period or long-term contract?
faqs.answer: No commitment period. The service operates on a monthly basis and can be cancelled anytime. We don't bind long-term contracts – we want to retain customers through quality.

faqs.question: How exactly does pricing work?
faqs.answer: You only pay for what you actually use. Pricing is determined by the number of bookings, restaurants and areas, and features used. No hidden costs.

faqs.question: What support do I get?
faqs.answer: English and Hungarian email and phone support is available. We also provide detailed documentation and video tutorials. Premium customers get a dedicated account manager.

faqs.question: Can I import existing data?
faqs.answer: Yes, we help migrate data from other systems. CSV and Excel import is available. Guest lists, booking history – we bring everything over.

faqs.question: Is the system GDPR compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes, we fully comply with GDPR requirements. Data is stored on EU servers, and we ensure all necessary data protection features.

faqs.question: Can I use it from my mobile phone?
faqs.answer: Yes, the system is fully responsive and mobile-friendly. Both the admin interface and guest booking interface work perfectly on phones and tablets.
